home_section1_smalltext: Welcome to BrainJuice - an ambitious project that incorporates quality Coffee, Aritificial Intelligence (AI) and Blockchain in one product.
home_section2_overlay_smalltext: An Ultra Smart Coffee Machine, And More.
home_section3_smalltext: Inpired by the rise of top notch cold brew coffee and fueled by our expertise in the field of technology, we create BrainJuice -  a project that incorporates quality coffee, artificial intelligence (AI) and blockchain in one product.
home_section3_barista_description:
A fully automatic coffee machine, supported by AI and connected to the BrainJuice mobile app.
BrainJuice has a futuristic design and uses 100% liquidized ingredients.
With no screen or button, it communicates with the mobile app via the QR code.
home_section3_app_description: A mobile application devoted to the end users who purchase coffee from the BrainJuice machines. Via this mobile application, users can set up profiles, order coffee online and scan the QR code on BrainJuice machines for payment and pickup.
home_section4_smalltext: "The better the returns, the higher the risks". Blockchain has made this statement obsolete.
home_section4_machine_description: Returns from 1 BrainJuice machine can be 3 times higher than from a traditional coffee shop. Investment can be up to 8 times lower.
home_section4_token_description: With AIBA, you can invest in any BrainJuice machine you want, with as much money as you care to spend.
home_section5_smalltext: News and public articles about BrainJuice products and events.
home_section6_smalltext: BrainJuice founded and developed by leading experts in the field of Coffee, Product Design, IoT and Blockchain.
home_section7_smalltext: Get in touch with us if you would like to know more about the BrainJuice project.
product_machine_section2_smalltext1:
BrainJuice is a fully automatic coffee machine. It uses 100% liquidized ingredients, runs on electricity and does not require water provision for operation.
With no screen or button, the machine communicates with the mobile app via its QR code.
product_machine_section2_smalltext2: End users communicate with BrainJuice machine solely via this mobile application, which enables them to set up profiles, order coffees, make payment and pick up.
product_machine_section2_smalltext3: Without this operating system, BrainJuice will be merely a souless machine. The OS processes and navigates users data, keeps tracks and organizes the operation of BrainJuice machines system.
product_app_section1_small: Enjoy the service of a personal barista right in your phone
product_app_section2_smalltext1: Have drink recommendations made by AI based on your unique taste and discover top trending drinks all over the world.
product_app_section2_smalltext2: Where information about your health, habits and taste is recorded and processed by Brain Juice.
product_app_section3_subhead2: Pick a drink from the standard menu or based on AI suggestions.
product_app_section3_subhead3: Brain Juice app automatically suggests the nearest located BrainJuice machines.
partnership_machine_section1_bigtitle: Scan the QR code in order to make payment and pick up your drink at the BrainJuice machine.
partnership_machine_section2_subhead1: Comparing to opening a coffee shop, owing a BrainJuice machine gives you triple the returns, at 8 times lower operation cost.
partnership_machine_section3_smalltext8: Traditional coffee shop: in charge of their own marketing activities, production and quality control.
partnership_machine_section3_subhead5: BrainJuice: everything is done for you
partnership_machine_section3_smalltext10: Traditional coffee shop: profits rate <30% per year
partnership_token_section1_bigtitle: BrainJuice machine: profits rate 90% per year
partnership_token_section2_bigtitle: AIBA allows investors to invest in the Brain Juice machines that they find the most potential and then, directly enjoy the revenues earned from such machines’ operation.
partnership_token_section2_paragraph1: A BrainJuice machine in Beijing is priced at 100,000 AIBA. Investor A in America invests 10,000 AIBA in the node of said machine. Therefore, he/she will own 10% of the machine’s value and enjoy 10% revenue earned by the machine.
partnership_token_section2_paragraph2: BrainJuice plans machines assembly and related costs.
partnership_token_section2_paragraph3: Development plans are then communicated to the BrainJuice community.
partnership_token_section2_paragraph4: Users send tokens to the node of the BrainJuice machine(s) in which they wish to invest.
partnership_token_section3_bigtitle: In case the invested tokens exceeds the machine’s value, investors who hold more tokens will be prioritized.
partnership_token_section3_proportion_it: Total supply: 3.500.000.000 Starting public sale Price: $0.2
partnership_token_button_downloadwpp:
Create demand from traditional investors.
Create motivations for big investors to hold their tokens.
Strategy to withdraw tokens from circulation.
team_section2_subhead: BrainJuice team includes leading experts in the fiields of engineering, smart device, aritificial intelligence and coffee production.
about_mission: Brain Juice looks forward to becoming a competitive brand in the coffee industry in terms of quality customer experience and attractive product pricing.
team_section3_member1_name: BrainJuice aims to tackle the problems of end users and coffee business owner. To end users, Brain Juice provides high-end, afforable and convenient service. To machine owners, Brain Juice provides an investment method of high returns.
